title: 大家来mcbbs多长时间了
author: wxx1111
txt_content: 一直想到10级当dalao，你们都来几天了。交友哦

replies.author: winsheng7770
replies.txt_content:
一星期左右
dalao 不好当啊

replies.author: 胡闹0519
replies.txt_content: 玩好久了，都是在mcbbs找服务器玩，嘿嘿

replies.author: LRual
replies.txt_content:
dalao是啥= =

replies.txt_content:
你好
我来了一个星期+1天
也就是今天是第8天。
